result.arabic_text: وَإِذَا تَوَلَّىٰ سَعَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيُفۡسِدَ فِيهَا وَيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡحَرۡثَ وَٱلنَّسۡلَۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡفَسَادَ
result.translation: 205. Nabiyow usuk (Akhnas deqsita num kinnuk) ku-garik yawqeeh foora waqdi Baaxö Bagul umaane Abuh yangayyeeh Sinam Buqre Baysaah Sinam lac Selam keh gexa, Yalli umaane celli haytam makicni.
